text:
i have main site running on server A say http://www.main.com, i have another 
web site running on server B say http://someip/home ,when i access website B 
directly through B session is maintained but when i am accessing  through 
server A which uses rediector to redirect to server B then session become null.
when i access through A address will be something like 
http://www.main.com/other/home.
creator: susheel.kumar@patni.com
